title: Sibling Watchery - Drag Race UK Season 3 - Episode 6
description:
Bob and Monet are back again this week with another fiery episode. Tune in to hear their hot takes on the latest episode of Drag Race UK!
For a limited time, we’ve partnered with Current to give away $1,000! That’s right, Current is giving away $250 to four listeners of this show. All you have to do is download the Current app and enter our code SIBLING during sign up before December 15th for a chance to win!
For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at calm.com/rivalry 
Buttah's so confident that it works, they're giving away their best selling sample kit for FREE. To get your FREE samples, go to ButtahSkin.com and use code "Glowup" at check out. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
